html:
1.21.18  2:55 am   Any tips on being productive? 

     know clearly what the task is, and the exact steps to do it. know even more clearly the step that you are currently on

1.21.18  2:53 am   How do you think your content effects your audience? 

     i don't really know. but i hope they like it

1.21.18  2:39 am   I want to learn to make music, any hints?

     find an instrument or something that is similar to an instrument, and check it out and see what that thing can do

1.21.18  1:53 am   If you couldn't make music would you use another artistic medium to express the things?

     of course. or for a thrill, maybe a non artistic medium

1.21.18  1:50 am   Remember Avatar? Highest grossing movie. Not even referenced in pop culture. Can you say a quote from that movie? I can't. I'm pretty sure almost no one can.

     i never saw it. but i think it had purple people in it. i think that's why everyone went, to see the purple people. but i actually saw them in the preview

1.21.18  1:32 am   Hey, uh, how do you get individual parts of songs to sound good when you put them together? I want to make music, but i cant seem to get the instruments to not be .01 seconds off.

     use a click? or if u don't want to use a click and you just want to go loosey goosey, make sure you do the drums first

1.21.18  1:27 am   how did you learn to write music?

     by listening to a lot of music, and then making up a lot of my own tricks

1.21.18  1:03 am   When did you do your last video

     in between the time it was uploaded and when the previous video was uploaded

1.20.18  11:55 pm   Why am I so hard to understand?

     because you have the ability to change

1.20.18  11:30 pm   what is hte sentence wirtten on ur shirt on yuor new snog?

     i'm not sure which one you mean but it might be one of these

1.20.18  11:22 pm   Did you write I want to go to burger king before or after going to burger king?

     before

1.20.18  11:16 pm   what exactly is your notebook/twitter page?

     things i've written using only text

     random thoughts that come into your mind, shit you make up based on something, stuff from a binder full of jokes you've written..?

1.20.18  11:10 pm   what time is 12:00 PM? night or mid-day

     day

1.20.18  10:52 pm   name some funny words.

     every word is funny

1.20.18  10:48 pm   do you think it's a good idea to trust humans?

     sometimes

1.20.18  10:01 pm   How to look cool when eating a cupcake? 

     carry a briefcase

1.20.18  9:43 pm   How many times will I have to ask before you run for president?

     if i ran for president i wouldn't have time to make any videos or music or any other type of creative content. instead i would have to spend all my time arguing on t.v. about who has the least scandals in their past

1.20.18  9:22 pm   do you like egg nog.

     i'd say it's gotta be hands down one of my top 5 favorite types of nog

1.20.18  8:57 pm   do you consider yourself a good person?

     yes but i am trying to get even better

     are good and evil real or just phony human concepts?

     good and evil are unfortunately both evil

1.20.18  8:37 pm   what are frogs?

     like fish with legs, i guess

1.20.18  8:32 pm   Why did you choose Shopify for your merch store?

     i didn't choose it. another company chose it, and also chose me

1.20.18  8:01 pm   what do you like most about existing

     doing stuff

1.20.18  7:53 pm   What was going through your mind when you made the video 'Chips (sponsored)'?

     the contents of the video

1.20.18  7:38 pm   Are you really that disgusted by merch even if for any touring artist it's a huge source of income ?

     yes

1.20.18  7:21 pm   How has being a musician changed your life?

     i've been a musician the entire time

1.20.18  7:07 pm   Why are a lot of words jumbled on your website ("ueqstions", "thabk you", etc.)?

     for a sense of fun, and enjoyment

1.20.18  6:43 pm   is songs your only job

     i also make videos, to go with the songs. or sometimes just videos

1.20.18  6:27 pm   when you write music, do you consciously consider the theory (maybe editing midi once recorded), or do you try to engrain it into your playing?

     i write all my music based on the way it sounds. 'music theory' is also supposed to be based on the way the music sounds. so it's a win-win, in that case

1.20.18  6:10 pm   Do you have any pre-made videos just waiting to be uploaded?

     no

1.20.18  5:59 pm   what happened to the reality videos

     they are still there

1.20.18  5:38 pm   why does christmas scare me so much? i dread it all year

     because there is a lot of pressure from society to waste a lot of money

1.20.18  5:22 pm   I get that you think videos and songs are more important than reality videos, but i still think you should find time to make reality videos. Maybe make it more 70-80% songs and videos 20-30% other and less 100% songs and videos 0% other.

     i was doing that last summer, i was trying to release 1 a day. but it was so much of a drag on the time schedule for the 'movie star' and 'outside' videos, i had to quit doing it. maybe i will try again, with a lighter time target. but less than 1 a day seems wrong

1.20.18  5:17 pm   hi, im kind of curious how time signatures work. like, i can recognize the beats in songs, and i know rhythm notation (quarter notes, eight notes, sixteenth notes, triplets, blah blah blah).. i know what time signatures mean, as in i know 4/4 means 4 quarter notes to a bar, or 6/8 means six eighth notes etc.. but what actually determines how you set the time signature if you're writing something out, like where to draw the barlines? can't you think of 4/4 as being 2 groups of 2 (2/4)?

     sure

      or can't you group 8 quarter notes together and call it 8/4 (or 8/8?)?

     sure

      or if you have a chord for 3 beats and then go to another chord for 5 beats, is that 3/4 + 5/4

     sure

      or is that still just 4/4 but the chord changes on the 4 instead of on the 1?

     sure

      sometimes it's obvious what the time signature should be, but sometimes i get confused. (p.s. i know i should use my ears and my spirit to make music, but i also want to get better at reading/writing too).

     it sounds like you are on the right track

1.20.18  5:11 pm   What note would you play after the note A

     it depends how, when, and why i played that first A

1.20.18  5:09 pm   Why is it so easy to sing about time?

     because our entire world is made of time

1.20.18  5:04 pm   are you really too small to go to the mall in real life?

     no

1.20.18  5:00 pm   why did life develop on earth and not someplace else?

     how do you know it didn't happen anywhere else

1.20.18  4:56 pm   Have you thought of putting your older songs (e.g. All U Need Is Love) on iTunes/Spotify?

     yes, i'm doing it now

1.20.18  4:55 pm   what is the saddest chord

     all chords can be happy and sad, and more

1.20.18  4:54 pm   Singing along with the new song, feeling like the "day" emanates super powers to defeat the stuff in my way

     oh nice, that's how it was meant to be

1.20.18  4:52 pm   I think of lots of songs in my head and sing them when I walk home, but I never write them down because I'm scared they'll come out wrong so I just forget them and move on but I want to sing them to people but I'm scared what should I do

     write them down

1.20.18  4:36 pm   Someone or something inspires you to make your songs?

     not in particular

1.20.18  4:02 pm   i hate every bit of everything i create. how do i change this?

     make it a little different?

1.20.18  3:49 pm   Is there anything really normal? Or just something weird that's become standard?

     yes! cars, and trucks

1.20.18  3:41 pm   do you use autotune?

     no

1.20.18  3:29 pm   You're so good at all this stuff you do, even though it's hard to describe it. How do you describe your stuff?

     forget that, i say do the thing. cut out the middle man, you know

1.20.18  3:24 pm   based on the time stamps here, you will stay up for entire days at a time.

     the time stamps on the questions have nothing to do with me

     what is your sleep schedule?

1.20.18  3:04 pm   how come the lyrics on the lyrics page dont match up up with the actual lyrics of the song song?

     i think there are 2 versions, and i don't remember which is which. but i'm not going to listen to it

1.20.18  2:57 pm   what would you do if the sky suddenly turned green?

     it does sometimes

1.20.18  2:43 pm   Do you get sponsored?

     no
